SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT rt.title, rt.nickname, rt.intro, rt.b_no, rt.boomup, rt.viewcnt, CASE WHEN rt.regdate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 3 THEN 'new' ELSE '' END AS newpost, CASE WHEN rt.regdate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - rt.regdate) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN rt.regdate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7 THEN TRUNC(ROUND(SYSDATE - rt.regdate)) || '일 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(rt.regdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') END AS regdate, rc.C_NO1, rc.C_NO2, rc.catename1, rc.catename2 FROM rec_board rt, rec_category rc WHERE rc.C_NO1 = rt.C_NO1 AND rc.C_NO2 = rt.C_NO2 AND intro LIKE '%' || #{sWord} || '%'
) t ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM rec_board rt, rec_category rc WHERE rc.C_NO1 = rt.C_NO1 AND rc.C_NO2 = rt.C_NO2 AND intro LIKE '%' || #{sWord} || '%'
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT ct.com_bno, ct.nickname, ct.com_title, ct.com_content, ct.replycnt, CASE WHEN ct.regdate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 3 THEN 'new' ELSE '' END AS newpost, CASE WHEN ct.regdate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - ct.regdate) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN ct.regdate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7 THEN TRUNC(ROUND(SYSDATE - ct.regdate)) || '일 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(ct.regdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') END AS regdate FROM com_board ct WHERE com_content LIKE '%' || #{sWord} || '%'
) t ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM com_board ct WHERE com_content LIKE '%' || #{sWord} || '%' )
